meaning_str.bing:
n. 宫殿；王宫；总统府；住在王宫里的人
网络. 皇宫；宫锁心玉；宫廷

宫殿；王宫；总统府；住在王宫里的人

宫殿；王宫；皇宫；豪华住宅；大厦；豪宅；（官位极高者的）府邸；官邸；总统府；主教官邸；宏伟的（公共）建筑物
宫殿的；主教宅邸的；大厦的；宫廷的；与君王接近的；奢侈的；豪华的

1.en: Beauty tried to explain her admiration for the Beast and the wonders of the palace, but they did not understand.
1.cn: 美女试图向她们解释她对野兽的倾慕之情，还有宫殿的奇妙之处，她们却不能明白。

2.en: The palace still shook occasionally as the earth rumbled in memory, groaned as if it would deny what had happened.
2.cn: 宫殿仍在不时地颤动，记忆中大地隆隆作响，叹息着拒绝承认曾经发生的一切。

3.en: Because . . . because. . . there was no one here for me in this cold-blooded palace.
3.cn: 因为…因为…在这冷血的皇宫里没有一个我的知心人。

0.en: Mind palace! Use your mind palace! How will that help?
0.cn: 记忆宫殿，用你的思维宫殿，那有什么用?

1.en: Tell me about the palace in which you were raised. It pales beside the palace of the Lord Khan.
1.cn: 跟我讲讲你儿时住的宫殿吧。与大汗的宫殿相比，黯然失色。

2.en: Buckingham Palace, perhaps the most famous palace in the world, is the official residence of Queen Elizabeth.
2.cn: 白金汉宫可能是全世界最著名的宫殿，它是伊利沙伯女皇的官方居所。

3.en: Once a 14th Century Palace, today the Louvre is the most visited art gallery in the world.
3.cn: 卢浮宫在十四世纪时曾是一座宫殿，如今则是全球参观人数最多的美术馆。

4.en: I am no royal. When the Khan's men attacked the Bayaut, I was a peasant girl, serving in the palace.
4.cn: 我不是什么公主，大汗的军队袭击巴牙兀惕部落时，我只是个普通女子，在宫殿里做侍女。

5.en: And where do you live, Mr. Kit? At the palace. My father's teaching me his trade. You're an apprentice? Of a sort.
5.cn: 还有基特先生，你住在哪？在宫殿里。我父亲在那里教我行商。所以你还是个学徒？差不多吧。

6.en: Here we are. This is the Queen's Palace. Hello. Is anybody there? Look at all the fusty stuff. Don't touch anything. Oops.
6.cn: 我们到了！这是女王的宫殿。您好，有人在吗？看看这些陈旧的东西！什么都别碰！啊哦！

7.en: Here we are. This is the Queen's Palace. Hello. Is anybody there? Look at all the fusty stuff. Don't touch anything. Oops.
7.cn: 我们到了！这是女王的宫殿。您好，有人在吗？看看这些陈旧的东西！什么都别碰！啊哦！

8.en: The palace and gardens will be remembered as the home of Princess Di and Prince Charles, and have recently undergone a multimillion-pound refurbishment.
8.cn: 这座宫殿和花园是王妃黛安娜和王储查尔斯的居所，最近正以数百万英镑来翻新。

9.en: They were not good old days, Mr. Moon. They were magnificent. And that theater of yours, it was a palace of wonder and magic.
9.cn: 那个年代岂止是好，月伯乐先生，应该说是鼎盛而辉煌。你拥有的那个剧院，就像一座神奇的宫殿，充满魔力。

10.en: I have a wall. I will obliterate your wall. I will take your fraudulent crown and I will spike your corpse to the gates of my new palace.
10.cn: 我有我的城墙。我会摧毁你的城墙，我会夺走你这顶骗来的皇冠，我会将你的尸体钉在我新宫殿的大门上。

11.en: Every year the Emperor would leave his palace in the forbidden city and go and negotiate with the gods for a prosperous and auspicious New Year for the people.
11.cn: 每年皇帝都会离开他在紫禁城里的宫殿，去与诸神商榷来年降福人间使国运昌隆，人民幸福的事宜。

12.cn: 皇宫酒吧，8点如何？ 内特会等你的。

13.en: Step back in time at the Luxor or Caesars Palace.
13.cn: 在卢克索宫或西泽宫中，时光彷佛正在倒流。

14.en: Nearby, Kensington Palace is open to the public year-round.
14.cn: 附近的肯辛顿宫全年开放给公众参观。

15.en: Shop for "Aloha" souvenirs or beachwear and admire Hulihe'e Palace.
15.cn: 选购「阿罗哈」纪念品或沙滩装，并前往欣赏古皇族夏日行宫 。

16.en: Sheldon, dinner's here. Tandoori Palace? No, we went somewhere new.
16.cn: 谢尔顿，吃饭啦。唐杜里膳宫？不，我们去了家新餐馆。

17.en: Why? Why would we change? We had a perfectly good palace. Tandoori Palace is our palace.
17.cn: 为什么？为什么要改变？已经有个完美的膳宫了。唐杜里膳宫就是我们的御膳房。

18.en: Ooh, Siam Palace? Yes. Uh, mee krob and chicken satay? Yes.
18.cn: 泰国菜吗？是的。泰式炒面与鸡肉沙爹 ？有的。

19.en: Spotted at the palace hotel, S. and B. Having a heart-to-heart.
19.cn: 发现在皇宫酒吧S和B说了交心话。
